ai-thag2.32:1.2_0: on and on, life after life.
ai-thag2.32:1.4_0: Painful is birth again and again.
ai-thag2.32:2.2_0: You won’t build a house again!
ai-thag2.32:2.3_0: their bonds are happy, their bonds in comfort,
ai-thag2.32:2.5_0: My mind is released from limits:
ai-thag2.32:2.6_0: in this very life it will dissipate.
